DOC.brief_summary: Patients mechanical ventilation risk malnutrition , could lead bad outcome . According guideline release authority organization , enteral nutrition ( EN ) prior approach critically ill patient . However , initiation delivery EN early period ICU admission frequently hamper , result underfeeding . The investigator speculate whether intensive enteral nutrition strategy could reinforce delivery EN thereby improve outcome . In multi-center , prospective , randomized parallel clinical trial , investigator aim assess feasibility , safety outcome intensive enteral nutrition mechanical-ventilated patient .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility , Safety , Outcomes Intensive Enteral Nutrition Patients With Mechanical Ventilation
DOC.criteria: predicted time mechanical ventilation 48 hour enteral nutrition pathway refuse informal consent surgeon refuse protocol palliative care
